content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (41.0, -82.0)) and a furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position (39.5, -79.5)) connected to the furnace
-  Transport belt (position (40.5, -83.5)) connected to the burner mining drill
-  Transport belt (position (38.5, -79.5)) connected to the burner inserter

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (60.0, -60.0))

### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), offshore pump (position (106.5, -32.5)), and small electric poles (positions (111.5, -30.5), (115.5, -32.5), (115.5, -30.5), (120.5, -26.5), (112.5, -24.5))
-  Pipe group (fluid system 211717) connecting offshore pump to boiler
-  Pipe group (fluid system 211712) connecting boiler to steam engine

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities function
-  Ensure that the positions passed to the connect_entities function are integers, not floats.
### Errors when using get_entity function
-  Ensure that the math module is imported before using the round_position function.
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the entity is placed at a valid position on the map.
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that the burner entities have fuel in their inventory.

### NAMESPACE
-  connect_entities function: 
    -  Failure mode: TypeError when positions are floats
    -  Success mode: Successfully connects entities
-  get_entity function: 
    -  Failure mode: NameError when math module is not imported
    -  Success mode: Successfully retrieves entity
-  Important variables:
    -  pump (OffshorePump entity)
    -  boiler (Boiler entity)
    -  steam_engine (SteamEngine entity)
    -  small_electric_pole (SmallElectricPole entity)
    -  burner_inserter (BurnerInserter entity)
    -  burner_mining_drill (BurnerMiningDrill entity)
    -  furnace (Furnace entity)
    -  transport_belt (TransportBelt entity)
